reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable, flattering, and true to size, with one noting it's particularly suitable for new mothers. The fabric quality receives mixed feedback, with some finding it decent while others describe it as flimsy. The length is also mixed, with some appreciating it being right above the knee while others find it too short in the front.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great versatile and attractive dress!!
items.body: Fits great!! I am 5'2" 101lbs - got a small. It makes your body look nice!! Soft material and medium to light thickness, so very comfortable. Very attractive on. Would be great in other colors too - may get another one!! Read more
items.author: Dr. Sonja

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome dress!
items.body: This is the type of dress that you may pass on purchasing because it may not look special. But you are wrong! This is such an awesome dress! I received an army green color dress in size large. It fit so nicely! I usually wear a medium (I'm 5 feet and about 135 lbs...a little curvy). However, if you want this dress to be really form fitting, you can get a smaller size. I like the larger size on me since I do not like anything too tight fitting. Although I am short and clothing can be longer on me, I think this dress was a perfect length (about an inch below my knee). And it is very comfortable too. Very soft to the touch and it feels good on your skin. It is a great dress to dress up or dress down: sandals, wedges, heels...whatever you feel like wearing with it! It is fully lined (polyester lining) so it appears to not be sheer and has some 'weight' to the fabric. It also has a scallop detail at the bottom of the hemline, with ruching on both sides of the dress. This makes the fit even better. The dress has a tank style upper top (simple style). You will not regret buying this dress! Read more
items.author: Revi347

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good enough
items.body: Cute, decent quality for the price. Fits TTS for me and the size recommended by Amazon seems to be the right size. My only concern is if it shrinks at all when it’s washed. I definitely wouldn’t put this in the dryer, so hopefully it won’t shrink. I guess if it does, it’s inexpensive enough that it’s not a big deal. Pretty color. Read more
items.author: vinegirlWI

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft material, fits perfectly and no panty lines
items.body: Adorable dress and comfortable. I always like the tighter fitting dresses, but hate the panty lines. This one does not show my panty lines!!! Color is great and material is soft. The length is perfect. Just turned 60 and have the sagging thigh skin especially after losing 40 lbs at my age. If you are trying to decide, get it!!! I am 5’4” weigh 120lbs and I got a small, fits perfectly. Gonna get more colors. This is the dark rose red, it’s like a hot pink color. Read more
items.author: Barbra Ballinghoff Crouch

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Didn't work for me - too much polyester and too big
items.body: I was looking for effortless, casual dresses to wear during the summertime with sneakers for running errands, etc. I thought these dresses would be perfect for that and ordered it in two different colors. In theory, I was right. But the execution of the dress didn't work for me. The outer material is about what I expected from Amazon - a poly blend, not ideal for summer, but workable. Absolutely what I expect at this low price point. But the problem is that it is also lined. I don't know why a dress like this needs to be lined - especially with more polyester. I was sweating just looking at the lining. The lining also served no purpose for me but perhaps it's because I ordered dark colors - they definitely were not see through. Sizing was also off. I'm a size 4, small, and the small was quite large on me in the waist which made it much less flattering. Rather than hug my shape as I would expect this style to, it added bulk at the waist due to the extra fabric. I have an athletic/muscular build particularly in my shoulders and upper back, and the top part fit great. Given that I would say overall the dress runs large and that you should go down a size. The center part where the two "wrap" parts meet at the inner thigh was also pretty short on me, but I'm 5'7" and also liked that about it as I like short dresses. I can see where others would think it was too short though especially when sitting. I guess the liner might provide some smoothing/camouflage but that's not something I need/want and even if I did, I definitely don't want to be wearing two layers of polyester for the purpose for which I bought these dresses. So, I do think this dress could work for others - as evidenced by the other reviews - but for my body and purposes, it was a no. Read more
items.author: TB82

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress for the money
items.body: I have this dress in two colors because it is so shape flattering for me. Stretchy, kind of T shirt material. Easy to wash. It can be dressed up or worn just plain. I love it. Read more
items.author: Angela

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved them so much I immediately bought additional colors
items.body: *love love love* these dresses. I bought the pink and navy sleeveless versions and the red short-sleeve version. The materials of each color are slightly different, but they are still all pretty great quality. No undone hems, material is soft and not itchy, and all the dresses have INNER LINING! No see through bottoms!! The shape is super flattering. I am a size US 0-4 depending on the brand, averaging around a 2. I got all three dresses in small. The waist area is a little loose, but the way the scrunch lays, it is not noticeable unless I stand awkwardly to stretch and make it obvious. My only weird fit was the underarm areas of the navy dress are a little loose, but easily fixed with a stitch to gather a little extra fabric. I have 30C cup size, so the looseness there is probably useful on bustier laddies (or lads, I don’t know you). The length is perfect to not feel like I don’t have to be constantly pulling it down to not show off my goodies, and it stays in place well. I feel like I could wear the dresses with some cute wedges and go to a nicer-than-casual restaurant, but they are versatile enough to just throw on some adidas and wear to a very-casual-hangover brunch with friends. I love them so much that I immediately bought more colors! TL;DR: super comfy, super cute, not skanky, 12/10 recommend. Read more
items.author: Kelsey Templeton

short_description:
Womens Dress Bodycon Sleeveless Ruched is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress Bodycon Sleeveless Ruched is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Dress Bodycon Sleeveless Ruched is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Grey, Light Apricot, Bright Orange, Purple Red, Army Green, Black, Coffee, Bright Green, Dark Rose Red, Rose Red, Lake Blue, Deep Blue, Stripe, Light Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
